problem_names:
lemma space_lborel_add_dim:
assumes "f \<in> space (lborel_f n)"
shows "f(n:=x) \<in> space (lborel_f (Suc n))"

lemma integral_lborel_f:
assumes "f \<in> borel_measurable (lborel_f (Suc n))"
shows "integral\<^sup>N (lborel_f (Suc n)) f = \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. \<integral>\<^sup>+ x. f (x(n := y)) \<partial>lborel_f n \<partial>lborel"

lemma emeasure_lborel_f_Suc:
assumes "A \<in> sets (lborel_f (Suc n))"
assumes "\<And>y. {x\<in>space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A} \<in> sets (lborel_f n)"
shows "emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A = \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n) {x\<in>space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A} \<partial>lborel"
lemma lborel_f_measurable_add_dim: "(\<lambda>f. f(n := x)) \<in> measurable (lborel_f n) (lborel_f (Suc n))"

lemma sets_lborel_f_sub_dim:
assumes "A \<in> sets (lborel_f (Suc n))"
shows "{x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n) \<in> sets (lborel_f n)"

lemma lborel_f_measurable_restrict:
assumes "m \<le> n"
shows "(\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<m}) \<in> measurable (lborel_f n) (lborel_f m)"
lemma lborel_measurable_sub_dim: "(\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<n}) \<in> measurable (lborel_f (Suc n)) (lborel_f n)"

lemma measurable_lborel_component [measurable]:
assumes "k<n"
shows "(\<lambda>x. x k) \<in> borel_measurable (lborel_f n)"
translations: lemma product_sigma_finite_interval: "product_sigma_finite (\<lambda>b. interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. product_sigma_finite (\<lambda>b. interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x))
unfolding product_sigma_finite_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i. sigma_finite_measure (interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x))
using  sigma_finite_interval_measure

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<And>x y. x \<le> y \<Longrightarrow> ?F x \<le> ?F y;
   \<And>a. continuous (at_right a) ?F\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> sigma_finite_measure (interval_measure ?F)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>i. sigma_finite_measure (interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x))
by auto
lemma l_borel_f_1: "distr (lborel_f 1) lborel (\<lambda>x. x 0) = lborel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distr (lborel_f 1) lborel (\<lambda>x. x 0) = lborel
unfolding lborel_f_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distr (Pi\<^sub>M {..<1} (\<lambda>b. lborel)) lborel
     (\<lambda>x. x 0) =
    lborel

using product_sigma_finite.distr_singleton[OF product_sigma_finite_interval, of 0]
    lborel_eq_real lessThan_Suc

proof (prove)
using this:
  distr
   (Pi\<^sub>M {0::?'a1} (\<lambda>b. interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x)))
   (interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x)) (\<lambda>x. x (0::?'a1)) =
  interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x)
  lborel = interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x)
  {..<Suc ?k} = insert ?k {..<?k}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. distr (Pi\<^sub>M {..<1} (\<lambda>b. lborel)) lborel
     (\<lambda>x. x 0) =
    lborel
by auto
lemma space_lborel_f: "space (lborel_f n) = Pi\<^sub>E {..<n} (\<lambda>_. UNIV)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. space (lborel_f n) = {..<n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV
unfolding lborel_f_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. space (Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)) =
    {..<n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV
unfolding space_PiM space_lborel space_borel

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {..<n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV = {..<n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV
by metis
lemma space_lborel_f_subset: "space (lborel_f n) \<subseteq> space (lborel_f (Suc n))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. space (lborel_f n) \<subseteq> space (lborel_f (Suc n))
unfolding space_lborel_f

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {..<n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV
    \<subseteq> {..<Suc n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV

by (rule subsetI, rule PiE_I, blast,
  metis PiE_E  Suc_n_not_le_n le_cases lessThan_subset_iff subsetCE)

lemma space_lborel_add_dim:
assumes "f \<in> space (lborel_f n)"
shows "f(n:=x) \<in> space (lborel_f (Suc n))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f(n := x) \<in> space (lborel_f (Suc n))
unfolding space_lborel_f

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f(n := x) \<in> {..<Suc n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV
using assms lessThan_Suc space_lborel_f

proof (prove)
using this:
  f \<in> space (lborel_f n)
  {..<Suc ?k} = insert ?k {..<?k}
  space (lborel_f ?n) = {..<?n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f(n := x) \<in> {..<Suc n} \<rightarrow>\<^sub>E UNIV
by auto

lemma integral_lborel_f:
assumes "f \<in> borel_measurable (lborel_f (Suc n))"
shows "integral\<^sup>N (lborel_f (Suc n)) f = \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. \<integral>\<^sup>+ x. f (x(n := y)) \<partial>lborel_f n \<partial>lborel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. integral\<^sup>N (lborel_f (Suc n)) f =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. \<integral>\<^sup>+ x. f (x(n := y))
        \<partial>lborel_f n
                       \<partial>lborel
unfolding lborel_f_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. integral\<^sup>N (Pi\<^sub>M {..<Suc n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)) f =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. \<integral>\<^sup>+ x. f (x(n := y))
        \<partial>Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)
                       \<partial>lborel

using product_sigma_finite.product_nn_integral_insert_rev[OF product_sigma_finite_interval, of "{..<n}", OF finite_lessThan _]
  assms[unfolded lborel_f_def] lborel_eq_real

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?i \<notin> {..<n};
   ?f \<in> borel_measurable
             (Pi\<^sub>M (insert ?i {..<n})
               (\<lambda>b. interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x)))\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> integral\<^sup>N
                     (Pi\<^sub>M (insert ?i {..<n})
                       (\<lambda>b. interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x)))
                     ?f =
                    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y.
   \<integral>\<^sup>+ x. ?f (x(?i := y))
                      \<partial>Pi\<^sub>M {..<n}
                                 (\<lambda>b.
                                     interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x))
 \<partial>interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x)
  f \<in> borel_measurable (Pi\<^sub>M {..<Suc n} (\<lambda>b. lborel))
  lborel = interval_measure (\<lambda>x. x)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. integral\<^sup>N (Pi\<^sub>M {..<Suc n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)) f =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. \<integral>\<^sup>+ x. f (x(n := y))
        \<partial>Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)
                       \<partial>lborel
by (simp add: lessThan_Suc)

lemma emeasure_lborel_f_Suc:
assumes "A \<in> sets (lborel_f (Suc n))"
assumes "\<And>y. {x\<in>space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A} \<in> sets (lborel_f n)"
shows "emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A = \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n) {x\<in>space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A} \<partial>lborel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                            {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                       \<partial>lborel
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                            {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                       \<partial>lborel

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                            {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                       \<partial>lborel
fix x y

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                            {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                       \<partial>lborel
assume "x\<in>space (lborel_f n)"

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> space (lborel_f n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                            {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                       \<partial>lborel
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<in> space (lborel_f n)
have "(indicator A) (x(n := y)) = (indicator {x\<in>space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}) x"

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> space (lborel_f n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. indicator A (x(n := y)) =
    indicator {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A} x
using indicator_def

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<in> space (lborel_f n)
  indicator ?S ?x = (if ?x \<in> ?S then 1::?'a else (0::?'a))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. indicator A (x(n := y)) =
    indicator {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A} x
by (metis (no_types, lifting) mem_Collect_eq)

proof (state)
this:
  indicator A (x(n := y)) =
  indicator {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A} x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                            {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                       \<partial>lborel

proof (state)
this:
  ?x4 \<in> space (lborel_f n) \<Longrightarrow>
  indicator A (?x4(n := ?y4)) =
  indicator {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := ?y4) \<in> A} ?x4

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                            {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                       \<partial>lborel
then

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ?x4 \<in> space (lborel_f n) \<Longrightarrow>
  indicator A (?x4(n := ?y4)) =
  indicator {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := ?y4) \<in> A} ?x4
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x4 \<in> space (lborel_f n) \<Longrightarrow>
  indicator A (?x4(n := ?y4)) =
  indicator {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := ?y4) \<in> A} ?x4

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                            {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                       \<partial>lborel

unfolding nn_integral_indicator[OF assms(1), symmetric] nn_integral_indicator[OF assms(2), symmetric]
     integral_lborel_f[OF borel_measurable_indicator, OF assms(1)]

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x4 \<in> space (lborel_f n) \<Longrightarrow>
  indicator A (?x4(n := ?y4)) =
  indicator {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := ?y4) \<in> A} ?x4

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. \<integral>\<^sup>+ x. indicator A (x(n := y))
        \<partial>lborel_f n
                       \<partial>lborel =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. integral\<^sup>N (lborel_f n)
                            (indicator
                              {x \<in> space (lborel_f n).
                               x(n := y) \<in> A})
                       \<partial>lborel
using nn_integral_cong

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x4 \<in> space (lborel_f n) \<Longrightarrow>
  indicator A (?x4(n := ?y4)) =
  indicator {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := ?y4) \<in> A} ?x4
  (\<And>x.
      x \<in> space ?M \<Longrightarrow> ?u x = ?v x) \<Longrightarrow>
  integral\<^sup>N ?M ?u = integral\<^sup>N ?M ?v

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. \<integral>\<^sup>+ x. indicator A (x(n := y))
        \<partial>lborel_f n
                       \<partial>lborel =
    \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. integral\<^sup>N (lborel_f n)
                            (indicator
                              {x \<in> space (lborel_f n).
                               x(n := y) \<in> A})
                       \<partial>lborel
by (metis (no_types, lifting))

proof (state)
this:
  emeasure (lborel_f (Suc n)) A =
  \<integral>\<^sup>+ y. emeasure (lborel_f n)
                          {x \<in> space (lborel_f n). x(n := y) \<in> A}
                     \<partial>lborel

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma lborel_f_measurable_add_dim: "(\<lambda>f. f(n := x)) \<in> measurable (lborel_f n) (lborel_f (Suc n))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
    \<in> lborel_f n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f (Suc n)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
    \<in> lborel_f n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f (Suc n)
have "x \<in> space lborel"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<in> space lborel
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  x \<in> space lborel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
    \<in> lborel_f n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f (Suc n)
have 0:"(\<lambda>(f, y). f(n := y)) \<circ> (\<lambda>xa. (xa, x)) = (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>(f, y). f(n := y)) \<circ> (\<lambda>xa. (xa, x)) =
    (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
unfolding comp_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>xa. case (xa, x) of (f, x) \<Rightarrow> f(n := x)) =
    (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
using case_prod_conv

proof (prove)
using this:
  (case (?a, ?b) of (c, d) \<Rightarrow> ?f c d) = ?f ?a ?b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>xa. case (xa, x) of (f, x) \<Rightarrow> f(n := x)) =
    (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
by fast

proof (state)
this:
  (\<lambda>(f, y). f(n := y)) \<circ> (\<lambda>xa. (xa, x)) =
  (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
    \<in> lborel_f n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f (Suc n)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
    \<in> lborel_f n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f (Suc n)
unfolding lborel_f_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
    \<in> Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M
          Pi\<^sub>M {..<Suc n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)

using measurable_comp[OF measurable_Pair2'[of x lborel "Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)", OF \<open>x \<in> space lborel\<close>]
    measurable_add_dim[of n "{..<n}" "\<lambda>b. lborel"], unfolded 0] lessThan_Suc

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
  \<in> Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M
        Pi\<^sub>M (insert n {..<n}) (\<lambda>b. lborel)
  {..<Suc ?k} = insert ?k {..<?k}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
    \<in> Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M
          Pi\<^sub>M {..<Suc n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (\<lambda>f. f(n := x))
  \<in> lborel_f n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f (Suc n)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma sets_lborel_f_sub_dim:
assumes "A \<in> sets (lborel_f (Suc n))"
shows "{x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n) \<in> sets (lborel_f n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
    \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
    \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
have "(\<lambda>f. f(n := y)) -` A \<inter> space (lborel_f n) \<in> sets (lborel_f n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := y)) -` A \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
    \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
using measurable_sets[OF lborel_f_measurable_add_dim assms]

proof (prove)
using this:
  (\<lambda>f. f(n := ?x1)) -` A \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
  \<in> sets (lborel_f n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. f(n := y)) -` A \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
    \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (\<lambda>f. f(n := y)) -` A \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
  \<in> sets (lborel_f n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
    \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  (\<lambda>f. f(n := y)) -` A \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
  \<in> sets (lborel_f n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
    \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
have "(\<lambda>f. f(n := y)) -` A = {x. x(n := y) \<in> A}"
by auto

proof (state)
this:
  (\<lambda>f. f(n := y)) -` A = {x. x(n := y) \<in> A}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
    \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
finally

proof (chain)
picking this:
  {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n) \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
show ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n) \<in> sets (lborel_f n)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n)
    \<in> sets (lborel_f n)
by metis

this:
  {x. x(n := y) \<in> A} \<inter> space (lborel_f n) \<in> sets (lborel_f n)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma lborel_f_measurable_restrict:
assumes "m \<le> n"
shows "(\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<m}) \<in> measurable (lborel_f n) (lborel_f m)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<m})
    \<in> lborel_f n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f m
using measurable_restrict_subset lborel_f_def assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?J \<subseteq> ?L \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<lambda>f. restrict f ?J)
  \<in> Pi\<^sub>M ?L ?M \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M Pi\<^sub>M ?J ?M
  lborel_f ?n = Pi\<^sub>M {..<?n} (\<lambda>b. lborel)
  m \<le> n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<m})
    \<in> lborel_f n \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f m
by auto
lemma lborel_measurable_sub_dim: "(\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<n}) \<in> measurable (lborel_f (Suc n)) (lborel_f n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<n})
    \<in> lborel_f (Suc n) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f n
using lborel_f_measurable_restrict[of "n" "Suc n"]

proof (prove)
using this:
  n \<le> Suc n \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<n})
  \<in> lborel_f (Suc n) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>f. restrict f {..<n})
    \<in> lborel_f (Suc n) \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M lborel_f n
by linarith

lemma measurable_lborel_component [measurable]:
assumes "k<n"
shows "(\<lambda>x. x k) \<in> borel_measurable (lborel_f n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. x k) \<in> borel_measurable (lborel_f n)
unfolding lborel_f_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. x k)
    \<in> borel_measurable (Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel))
using assms measurable_PiM_component_rev

proof (prove)
using this:
  k < n
  \<lbrakk>?i \<in> ?I; ?f \<in> ?M ?i \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M ?N\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> (\<lambda>x. ?f (x ?i))
                    \<in> Pi\<^sub>M ?I ?M \<rightarrow>\<^sub>M ?N

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<lambda>x. x k)
    \<in> borel_measurable (Pi\<^sub>M {..<n} (\<lambda>b. lborel))
by simp_all
end
